title: How many times you are AFK a month?
body:
Survey is anonymous

I'm curious... How many times (in average) you are AFK on average month? Choose your answer please.

replies.body:
0.

I have 10k plus games played and ive afked 0 times...

Hmmm wait no once. My pregnant wife started having crippling stomach pains mid game so i had to quit and rush her to the hospital.
You need to have your priorities straight. Cant believe you left your team for your pregnant wife. #reported. (SARCASM)
is it possible to learn such power?
Not from a jedi
0 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
less than once is 0
it was meant to mean that for example you could have been AFK only 4 times a year = an average of 0,33333 times a month... but exact "your" answer in this case does not matter
AFK = Away from Keyboard. I leave my keyboard at least a few times a day to go to the bathroom, so I guess Many.
My friend, you are trolling. in players' jargon "AFK" has a certain meaning. It means that someone was "disconnected" from the game.
No, that's if you're AFK in a game. AFK in a general sense just means away from the keyboard. Be more specific.
you are the only person who did not understand the content of this thread
oh no, I understood. I just figured I'd take your question literally.

I'm disappointed. It seems that this forum have only 16 readers and only that readers are active. It looks like only those 16 people were here and only those people have viewed this thread 88 times - each. Seriously? No more people on this forum? Who is creating those thread? Bots?
4 more guys... help me please ;)

I voted once per month, but AFK by choice it's far less.

I've probably left 5 games intentionally in the 6+ years I've played, due to real life emergencies and other such things.

Unfortunately, I live in Rural Wisconsin, with Backwoods sketchy internet, as well as a 9 year old laptop.  Combining those two things, it's probably about once a month where my laptop will crash for various reasons, or the internet will go out.  I always try to return, and often do(Got a leaver for one where my Laptop crashed the other day, made it back within 3 mins, won the game, got punished.), but it probably averages out to once a month where I'm actually AFK for the game.

I've also left during loading 3 times in the last year.  Once because I forgot smite when trading to jungle, and twice because issues came up IRL.  Leaving during loading allowed my team to remake the game, rather than auto losing due to my lack of smite or sudden lack of time.
If there is only 13 players on the forum? Who is the rest? Topic have 1200 views... what da hell?
OK. Now we have 13 votes. I need 7 more. Can you do it guys?
Happens. Sometimes. Not enough to trigger a punishment. It's mainly because I sometimes have huge intestinal pain that I can't predict.

Been playing since may 2007.  Dinconnected twice due to internet crashing and power loss. 

Had to step away maybe 3 times and in all of those, my son took over (he plays as well) and in all of them I was back in less than 5 mins.

(being honest because no one will admit it.)well only if your team flames you constantly or.... if you experience a stomped matchup yet your team says your bad i feel you should have that "allowed " leave at least once every 3 months basically once in a blue moon i do that idk about you all "im Mr. Perfect mentality" im human and admit mistakes can be made and experience sometimes rage due to stomp matches. but thats rare to me.

If you mean Away from Keyboard, then often. Sometimes I go to the bathroom during a death or sprint to turn off the oven while walking to tower.

This too...

Iirc this year I left games twice, once because of connection issues, once because something came up irl. So 1/6 per month.
